tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) when a page uses `#[Url]` for a property. An attacker can inject HTML code into the user's browser session by crafting a malicious link and convincing the user to click on it.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version of this package >= 3.3.5 and <= 4.2.0.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `livewire/livewire` library to the patch version.
